short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Digital Minimalist approach to Facebook. Block news feed, remove notification badges and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension approaches Facebook like a Digital Minimalist. It takes inspiration from Cal Newport's book "Digital Minimalism". This app can block the news feed, group feeds and remove the notification badges and many more. This reduces the ability for Facebook to grab your attention.
